story:
Dear ELF emmit backers,

Thank you, once again, for your enthusiasm and support of our Indiegogo campaign. We couldn’t have done it without you, and your support really overwhelmed us. Over 400% of our target goal is truly amazing. We are humbled and grateful.

The time has come for you to choose your preferred color, an option which was unlocked by achieving our stretch target. Please fill it out the short survey  that will be sent  to you in the this week (aroudd 23.9.) we’ve prepared—in it, you’ll be able to choose your preferred color (for one or more ELF emmits, depending on how many you ordered). You’ll have a week to fill out the survey and choose, and then we’ll be sending out the units! In order to arrange the color options, there will be a very slight delay in shipping out ELF emmits to all of you. Instead of them shipping 30 September we plan to ship October 25—when you receive them depends really on the postal service (they will ship from Europe, and we’ll send them first to those who backed us earliest).

 Please find all info about your Elfemmit on  http://www.elfemmit.com/indiegogo

Thank you all and very best wishes!

The ELF emmit team

 

 

 

Reserve Today to Ensure Priority September Delivery

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Synchronize your mind and body.

 

 

 

The only wearable using cutting-edge neuroscience to guide the natural frequencies & rhythms of your mind.


 

 

ELF emmit uses non-invasive and FDA Approved technology to actively influence positive change in your daily life by emitting pulses at specific frequencies, optimized to attain a desired state of mind, at any given moment.

 

 

 

This FDA Approved technology known as Pulsed Electromagnetic Stimulation (PEMS) has nearly 50 years of medical/neurological applications and scientifically-proven health benefits, with it's origins dating back to ancient times.

Until now, similar technological devices were big, heavy, expensive and not convenient for daily use. We’ve adapted this technology to make a product that is wearable daily and affordable to everybody.

 

 

THE NATURAL FREQUENCY OF YOUR MIND

All humans display (5) five different types of electrical patterns or "brain waves" across the cortex that can be observed with an EEG (electroencephalograph).

 

Your moods – whether you are relaxed, focused, stressed, tired, or distracted – are directly tied to the electrical activity in your brain.

 

The (5) five brain waves in order of highest frequency to lowest:

  1. Gamma Wave 
  2. Beta Wave (concentration)
  3. Alpha Wave (anti-stress/deep learning)
  4. Theta Wave (meditation)
  5. Delta Wave (sleep)

 

Your mind and body are often at odds with the tasks you are trying to accomplish.

 

When we’re focusing hard, our brainwaves spike up to 30 Hz per second. The ELF emmit emits pulses from 2 Hz up to 19 Hz—nothing beyond the natural rhythm of the mind.

 

 

Our brain’s ability to transition through various brain wave frequencies plays a large role in how successful we are at managing stress, focusing on tasks, and getting a good night’s sleep.

​

 

 

 

 

 

 

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!

 

Thanks to the incredible support from our backers, the ELF emmit campaign has passed $100,000! We're rewarding every backer with their choice of four additional stylish two-tone color combinations. At the end of our campaign, backers will receive a survey allowing them to select from the standard all White, White/Blue, White/Green, White/Purple, or White/Translucent.

 

HOW ELF EMMIT IMPROVES LIFE IN ALMOST ANY SITUATION

The ELF emmit contains an electromagnetic coil, allowing it to emit extra-low frequency electromagnetic pulses complementary to the brainwaves your body already produces. 

 

These pulses target the cerebellum, gently coaxing your current brainwave frequency to speed up or slow down and match your desired mood.

Each of ELF emmit's (5) mood settings emit pulses at a specific frequency, optimized to help you attain and transition to your desired state of mind.

 

 

SELECT A DESIRED MOOD TO MATCH THE NATURAL FREQUENCY OF YOUR MIND

The ELF emmit emits pulses from 2 Hz up to 19 Hz to coax your desired brainwaves along—nothing beyond the mind's natural rhythm.

 

 

CONCENTRATE

HIGH FREQUENCY BETA WAVES FOR CONCENTRATION & FOCUS

The quick pulses of ELF emmit’s Concentrate Mood multiply your ability to problem-solve, to process information, to multitask and to remain focused and alert.

The Beta waves this mood promotes are very fast (high frequency, low amplitude) brain waves that most people exhibit throughout the day in order to complete conscious tasks such as critical thinking, writing, reading, and socialization. They tend to have a stimulating effect.

Having an appropriate level of beta waves allows us to focus and complete school or work-based tasks easily. When you drink caffeine or have another stimulant, your beta activity will naturally increase.

 

 

ANTI-STRESS

MODERATE FREQUENCY ALPHA WAVES TO REDUCE STRESS

ELF emmit's Anti-Stress Mood induces alpha brainwaves that help to calm you down, inducing a peaceful state of mind. 

This frequency range bridges the gap between our conscious thinking and subconscious mind, or between beta and theta. It helps us calm down when necessary and promotes feelings of deep relaxation.

If we become stressed, a phenomenon called "alpha blocking" may occur which involves excessive beta activity and very little alpha. Essentially the beta waves "block" out the production of alpha waves, because we are too agitated.

 

 

DEEP LEARNING

ALPHA WAVES FOR LEARNING & RETENTION

ELF emmit‘s Deep Learning Mood induces a state similar to the one we achieve just before we fall asleep and just after we wake up, increasing your ability to learn and retain knowledge by a huge degree.

Induce a state of learning at anytime, increasing your ability to learn and retain knowledge up to 4 times. These waves are important for cognitive functioning, learning, memory and information processing.

Thought processes for learning are most flexible when the mind is tuned from beta to alpha state.

 

 

MEDITATE

SLOW FREQUENCY THETA WAVES FOR MEDITATION

ELF emmit's Meditate Mood induces a predominance of theta brain waves, which enable you to control your mental processes and optimally balance all your cognitive functions.

Theta waves are connected to us experiencing and feeling deep, raw emotions in a deeply relaxed, semi-hypnotic state. A predominance of theta waves boosts our intuition and creativity, and makes us feel more natural.

It is also involved in restorative sleep. As long as theta waves aren't produced in excess during our waking hours, they are a very helpful brain wave range.

 

 

SLEEP

SLOWEST FREQUENCY DELTA WAVES FOR RESTORATIVE SLEEP

ELF emmit's Sleep Mood induces a predominance of delta brain waves, the slowest band it stimulates. With delta brain waves dominating, your body rests, its functions rest, and your immune system is boosted.

These are the slowest recorded brain waves in human beings, found most often in infants and young children (they sleep a lot) but as we age, we produce less, even during deep sleep. 

Delta waves are associated with the deepest levels of relaxation and restorative, healing sleep. Adequate production of delta waves helps us feel completely rejuvenated after we wake up from a good night’s sleep.

 

 

​

 

 

 

 

THE SMARTPHONE APP CONTROLS AN ELECTROMAGNETIC COIL VIA THE HEADPHONE JACK

Our emotions and other external stimuli can cause our mental frequency to shift, disrupting our ability to function as we might like. ELF emmit encourages this frequency to get back in line with the task at hand.

 

 

Your moods – whether you are relaxed, focused, stressed, tired, or distracted – are directly tied to the electrical activity in your brain. Powered by your smartphone and using a free app with an easy to use interface, ELF emmit can help you train your brainwaves to sync up with the mood you want to reach.

 

 

Choose a mood in the free mobile app, and ELF emmit will start to work. With repeated use, your brain will grow accustomed to the stimuli ELF emmit produces and adapt more and more quickly.

 

=

 

 

 

 

THE PACE OF MODERN LIFE HAS GROWN INCREASINGLY RAPID AND STRESSFUL

For many, it is difficult to imagine taking the time to relax, to light a fire in your hearth and just sit and watch it, to meditate, to ride a train and fall asleep to the smooth sound of turning wheels. Playing drums or meditating in the middle of the office seem equally unimaginable. The ELF emmit offers an alternative solution.

 

 

FDA approved technology implemented in a 100% safe, non-invasive device

The PEMS technology used in the ELF emmit has been approved by the FDA for medical applications, and is completely safe and non-invasive. Running at 3.4 millitesla (mT), a measurement of magnetic fields, the ELF emmit is totally harmless. It is just powerful enough to be recognized and responded to by our brains.

 

 

Quality materials to last a lifetime

ELF emmit uses simple construction without many moving parts and is built from resilient poly-carbonate and thermoplastic. It will stand the test of time, even with repeated daily use. 

 

 

Carefully crafted with sleek, modern design

Expertly designed in a slim, elegant headband, the ELF emmit is equally at home in your place of residence, the office, or anywhere else.

While most devices utilizing PEMS technology are bulky, heavy, and require a power outlet to run, the ELF emmit weighs just .7 ounces and gets all its power from your headphone jack. It is light enough to be taken wherever you go and be worn all day or night.

 

 

Open source for endless possibilities

ELF emmit's software is entirely open source. Right now, students and their professors as well as expert specialists are working on new and exciting applications for the system.

In addition to developing our own new programs, we’ll carefully check any that are sent to us and add them to the app if they really do work.

​

 

 

In the past, people used extremely low frequencies to achieve altered states of consciousness. Meditation along with the rhythmic sound of drums, gong therapy, or steady flashing lights can all transport you into a state of thoughtfulness and transcendence.

Even the sound of rolling wheels when riding a train can put us to sleep. The brain reacts to every color, voice, sound, loved one, and dissatisfaction. 

The ELF emmit taps into this reaction, blending the traditions of the past with the technology of the future - wearables grounded in neuroscience. It uses state-of-the-art extra-low frequency pulsed electromagnetic therapy to naturally and non-invasively optimize the performance of your mind and body.

Our minds and bodies run at different speeds, depending on what we are doing. Problems arise when, because of upper impact interference, your brain frequency is not aligned with what you are trying to do or to achieve. We have all experienced how fear and stress inhibit you from thinking clearly and concentrating. Don’t forget what happens to our concentration when we are in love! 

We may feel great, but we’re in big trouble if we have to concentrate on something other than the object of our affections. In the same way, external electrical frequencies, not aligned with our brain frequencies, can disrupt our ability to function as we might like. These emotions and external stimuli cause our brain frequency to swing sharply, and our level of concentration moves along with it. Unfortunately, we are not all yoga gurus, able to balance ourselves through meditation, wherever we find ourselves.

Imagine if you could rewire your brain to connect a situation to the mental state that best suits it, by choosing yourself. That is what the ELF emmit will help you achieve.

 

 

​

 

 

Is your video available in other languages?

Yes it is! We currently have the video localized into Arabic, Chinese, German, Hebrew, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish.

 

What is ELF emmit made of?

ELF emmit is made of non-allergenic plastic. It is smooth, flexible and completely latex-free. Designed as a headband that rests just above your ears, wrapped around the back of your head, it contains sophisticated technology. Please treat your ELF emmit with care and avoid unnecessary bending. Let it become your personal assistant for many years to come.

 

How can I clean my ELF emmit?

Clean the exterior of your ELF emmit device with Isopropyl Alcohol or alcohol-based sanitizer applied to a cloth or cotton swab. Do not submerge the device in any liquids.

 

Where does the name come from?

ELF stands for "extra-low frequency," since it uses extra-low frequency electromagnetic pulses to stimulate the brain. The "emmit" part? Well, let’s just say it’s a creative spelling of "emit" as in "emitting electromagnetic pulses."

 

Is ELF emmit a safe device?

Of course! We’ve created ELF emmit as device that relies exclusively on natural extra-low frequency electromagnetic pulses, which are complementary to the chemistry and functions of the body. It is entirely non-invasive and completely safe.

 

Is it FDA approved?

ELF emmit doesn’t require a FDA approval, as it’s not considered a medical device. But the scientific principle on which it is based, PEMT (pulsed electromagnetic therapy) is FDA approved.

 

Why is ELF emmit a headband?

Low frequency electromagnetic pulses that ELF emmit produces penetrate through the body. However, the intensity decreases as the distance grows from the target area: the brain. That's why we designed ELF emmit as a headband.

 

Can I wear ELF emmit for a longer period?

Yes. But we recommend you to follow the user guide instructions. Why? Because using a single frequency longer than necessary may lead to loss of a benefit previously experienced. It's like entering a room full of flowers. After a while you get accustomed to the scent.

 

How can I charge my ELF emmit?

ELF emmit uses your mobile phone or tablet as its energy source, plugged in via the headphone jack. As long as your phone or tablet is charged, ELF emmit is charged, too.

 

What are the benefits of my ELF emmit being powered via the headphone jack?

This system offers a safety guarantee—if you are comfortable wearing headphones, which get their power from the headphone jack, then you’ll be just as comfortable wearing the ELF emmit, as the same, entirely harmless, amount of electricity powers both. This also allowed us to make the ELF emmit as slim and lightweight as possible, since it does not need to contain a bulky battery.

 

How does the ELF emmit smart phone application send information to the device?

The ELF emmit application communicates with the ELF Emmit device via the cable, which plugs into the headphone jack of your tablet or smartphone, and which likewise powers the device.

 

Can ELF emmit get wet?

ELF emmit is water resistant, but not waterproof. It will do well through the normal day-to-day use, but please don’t go scuba diving with it.

 

Do you protect my privacy and how?

We absolutely protect your privacy, at a very high level. All your data belongs to you. We take the responsibility of protecting your data and privacy seriously. You can read more about our data privacy policy here.

 

Can I become a domestic or international dealer of ELF emmit?

Of course. We strongly support this idea of yours, and will help you as much as possible! To apply, please email us. You will receive an email confirmation and shortly thereafter our marketing team will contact you and walk you through the process.

 

What technology does ELF emmit use?

It uses PEMS (pulsed electromagnetic stimulation) technology that naturally changes the predominant brain speed pattern. Our bodies are electrical and chemical: every heartbeat generates electromagnetic pulses that chemically stimulate tissues and cells. ELF emmit encourages the brain to produce a certain rhythm that best suits the state of mind you’d like to be in, with the use of low frequency electromagnetic stimulation.

 

Uh, what’s PEMS technology, again?

Brain frequencies are produced by masses of neurons communicating with each other, changing according to what we are doing or feeling. Different brain frequencies result in different states of mind.

PEMS technology uses very weak electro-magnetic impulses in extra-low frequencies, to encourage our mind to work at a speed we choose, to best perform the task at hand. In the same way that meditating along with the rhythmic sound of drums, gong therapy and steady flashing lights all transport you into a state of thoughtfulness and transcendence, PEMS can guide your mood.

 

Is the efficacy of PEMS scientifically supported?

Yes, it is! The concepts behind PEMS technology have been around for millennia. The ancient Greek physician, Galen, wrote about the healing properties of magnets back around 200 BC, and it has always been a staple of Chinese medicine. Even in the US, it was used widely until 1908, when a medical report by physician Abraham Flexner dramatically changed the way America medicated, leading to a shift towards an almost complete reliance on pharmaceuticals over other, less-invasive treatments. There are several variations on this therapy such as PEMF (pulsed electromagnetic field therapy and PEMT (pulsed electromagnetic therapy). 

PEMS, PEMT and PEMF have a rich history in the US, as well as FDA approval. Magnetic therapy was marginalized in the US until the early 1970s, when a Dr Friedenberg published his findings that electromagnetic field therapy helped certain types of bone fractures to heal more quickly than similar fractures in patients who were not exposed to this treatment. This was expanded by Dr Andrew Bassett of Columbia University Medical Center, who in 1974, found further success in treating non-healing bone fractures and pseudarthroses, with the use of low frequency electromagnetic signals. In 1979, the FDA approved the use of electromagnetic therapy for fractures. A decade later, the FDA approved its use for treating pain and edema. In 2011, transcranial magnetic stimulation received FDA approval for treating depression, and for treating migraines in 2013. ELF emmit draws on this long, rich history of the scientifically-proven success of electromagnetic therapy. 

 

Do I need to be at a certain place to use ELF emmit?

Not at all. You can use it anywhere. All you need is a tablet or smart phone to choose the working mode.

 

Can the ELF emmit improve my general health?

Absolutely! ELF emmit can help reduce stress, improve concentration and aid sleeping.

 

How does ELF emmit influence my body?

ELF emmit produces low frequency electromagnetic pulses that gently encourage your brain waves to join in with the chosen frequency of the pulses. With regular use, your brain will quickly synchronize with your chosen state of mind, thanks to ELF emmit acting as an intermediary.

 

Will I feel the effects right away?

You will not feel the effects the instant you turn on the device for the first time. ELF emmit trains your brain, rather than suddenly altering it the moment you first turn it on. We recommend regular use for at least a week, at which point you will certainly notice a difference. The brain takes a bit of time and practice to synchronize with the pulses produced by ELF emmit. Once your brain has been trained to sync with ELF emmit, you should feel results immediately and regularly when using it.

 

Can I use ELF emmit too much?

No. Low frequency electromagnetic stimulation has minimal-to-no effect on healthy cells. Actually it seems to be ignored by cells that are in optimal condition, balanced and in no need for extra energy. Use it as much as you like, but only when you need it. 

 

I was told electromagnetic waves produce "electro smog," and that this is a bad thing.

Electro smog comes from devices with particular field strengths and high frequencies. These frequencies can induce heat in tissue and potentially damage cells. Our technology is based on carefully-selected low frequency stimulation that is non-invasive, natural, and does not create electro smog. No worries.

 

Does ELF emmit work with iOS and Android?

Yes. ELF emmit works with both iOS and Android.

 

Where can I download the application?

The application is available both in Google Play and the Apple Store.

 

What devices are compatible with ELF emmit?

Most smart phones and tablets are compatible with Elf emmit.

 

Is there a web application?

We do not have a web application at this time.

 

Do I have to pay for the app?

The ELF emmit application is absolutely free.

 

What is your returns policy?

During the Indiegogo campaign, you can get a refund via Indiegogo anytime. But we are so confident in the quality and efficacy of our products that we are happy to offer a complete 30-day, money-back guarantee after the campaign, as well. Just visit our website, www.elfemmit.com, which will go live after the campaign, and there will be a "returns" button. We will give you a 100% refund if you are not completely satisfied within 30 days of your receipt of our product, no questions asked. 

 

How can I tell that it’s on and working?

The electromagnetic pulses produced by ELF emmit have no physical sensation on the skin, which is one of the reasons it’s so non-invasive, comfortable and easy to use regularly. Plugged in, and with the app running, the ELF emmit is working—the screen will dim, and the text will indicate that the device is working. The app is designed to tell you if there is a problem and the product is not functioning.

 

Is ELF emmit recommended by health professionals?

Yes, it is. Although ELF emmit is not a medical device, and does not substitute for medical advice or doctor’s appointments, health professionals endorse ELF emmit and believe that it contributes to better overall health, primarily through decreasing stress, increasing concentration and improving sleep.

 

Is ELF emmit a medical device?

No. ELF emmit does not diagnose or cure any health condition or problem, so it is not officially considered a medical device, though it can contribute to better overall well-being and an improved lifestyle.

 

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do, and all shipping charges are covered when you back our project.
story_txt:
Dear ELF emmit backers,Thank you, once again, for your enthusiasm and support of our Indiegogo campaign. We couldn’t have done it without you, and your support really overwhelmed us. Over 400% of our target goal is truly amazing. We are humbled and grateful.The time has come for you to choose your preferred color, an option which was unlocked by achieving our stretch target. Please fill it out the short survey  that will be sent  to you in the this week (aroudd 23.9.) we’ve prepared—in it, you’ll be able to choose your preferred color (for one or more ELF emmits, depending on how many you ordered). You’ll have a week to fill out the survey and choose, and then we’ll be sending out the units! In order to arrange the color options, there will be a very slight delay in shipping out ELF emmits to all of you. Instead of them shipping 30 September we plan to ship October 25—when you receive them depends really on the postal service (they will ship from Europe, and we’ll send them first to those who backed us earliest). Please find all info about your Elfemmit on  http://www.elfemmit.com/indiegogoThank you all and very best wishes!The ELF emmit team   Reserve Today to Ensure Priority September Delivery           Synchronize your mind and body.   The only wearable using cutting-edge neuroscience to guide the natural frequencies & rhythms of your mind.  ELF emmit uses non-invasive and FDA Approved technology to actively influence positive change in your daily life by emitting pulses at specific frequencies, optimized to attain a desired state of mind, at any given moment.   This FDA Approved technology known as Pulsed Electromagnetic Stimulation (PEMS) has nearly 50 years of medical/neurological applications and scientifically-proven health benefits, with it's origins dating back to ancient times.Until now, similar technological devices were big, heavy, expensive and not convenient for daily use. We’ve adapted this technology to make a product that is wearable daily and affordable to everybody.  THE NATURAL FREQUENCY OF YOUR MINDAll humans display (5) five different types of electrical patterns or "brain waves" across the cortex that can be observed with an EEG (electroencephalograph). Your moods – whether you are relaxed, focused, stressed, tired, or distracted – are directly tied to the electrical activity in your brain. The (5) five brain waves in order of highest frequency to lowest: 
Gamma Wave 
Beta Wave (concentration)
Alpha Wave (anti-stress/deep learning)
Theta Wave (meditation)
Delta Wave (sleep)
 Your mind and body are often at odds with the tasks you are trying to accomplish. When we’re focusing hard, our brainwaves spike up to 30 Hz per second. The ELF emmit emits pulses from 2 Hz up to 19 Hz—nothing beyond the natural rhythm of the mind.  Our brain’s ability to transition through various brain wave frequencies plays a large role in how successful we are at managing stress, focusing on tasks, and getting a good night’s sleep.​      STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED! Thanks to the incredible support from our backers, the ELF emmit campaign has passed $100,000! We're rewarding every backer with their choice of four additional stylish two-tone color combinations. At the end of our campaign, backers will receive a survey allowing them to select from the standard all White, White/Blue, White/Green, White/Purple, or White/Translucent. HOW ELF EMMIT IMPROVES LIFE IN ALMOST ANY SITUATIONThe ELF emmit contains an electromagnetic coil, allowing it to emit extra-low frequency electromagnetic pulses complementary to the brainwaves your body already produces.  These pulses target the cerebellum, gently coaxing your current brainwave frequency to speed up or slow down and match your desired mood.Each of ELF emmit's (5) mood settings emit pulses at a specific frequency, optimized to help you attain and transition to your desired state of mind.  SELECT A DESIRED MOOD TO MATCH THE NATURAL FREQUENCY OF YOUR MINDThe ELF emmit emits pulses from 2 Hz up to 19 Hz to coax your desired brainwaves along—nothing beyond the mind's natural rhythm.  CONCENTRATEHIGH FREQUENCY BETA WAVES FOR CONCENTRATION & FOCUSThe quick pulses of ELF emmit’s Concentrate Mood multiply your ability to problem-solve, to process information, to multitask and to remain focused and alert.The Beta waves this mood promotes are very fast (high frequency, low amplitude) brain waves that most people exhibit throughout the day in order to complete conscious tasks such as critical thinking, writing, reading, and socialization. They tend to have a stimulating effect. Having an appropriate level of beta waves allows us to focus and complete school or work-based tasks easily. When you drink caffeine or have another stimulant, your beta activity will naturally increase.  ANTI-STRESSMODERATE FREQUENCY ALPHA WAVES TO REDUCE STRESSELF emmit's Anti-Stress Mood induces alpha brainwaves that help to calm you down, inducing a peaceful state of mind. This frequency range bridges the gap between our conscious thinking and subconscious mind, or between beta and theta. It helps us calm down when necessary and promotes feelings of deep relaxation. If we become stressed, a phenomenon called "alpha blocking" may occur which involves excessive beta activity and very little alpha. Essentially the beta waves "block" out the production of alpha waves, because we are too agitated.  DEEP LEARNINGALPHA WAVES FOR LEARNING & RETENTIONELF emmit‘s Deep Learning Mood induces a state similar to the one we achieve just before we fall asleep and just after we wake up, increasing your ability to learn and retain knowledge by a huge degree.Induce a state of learning at anytime, increasing your ability to learn and retain knowledge up to 4 times. These waves are important for cognitive functioning, learning, memory and information processing. Thought processes for learning are most flexible when the mind is tuned from beta to alpha state.  MEDITATESLOW FREQUENCY THETA WAVES FOR MEDITATIONELF emmit's Meditate Mood induces a predominance of theta brain waves, which enable you to control your mental processes and optimally balance all your cognitive functions.Theta waves are connected to us experiencing and feeling deep, raw emotions in a deeply relaxed, semi-hypnotic state. A predominance of theta waves boosts our intuition and creativity, and makes us feel more natural. It is also involved in restorative sleep. As long as theta waves aren't produced in excess during our waking hours, they are a very helpful brain wave range.  SLEEPSLOWEST FREQUENCY DELTA WAVES FOR RESTORATIVE SLEEPELF emmit's Sleep Mood induces a predominance of delta brain waves, the slowest band it stimulates. With delta brain waves dominating, your body rests, its functions rest, and your immune system is boosted.These are the slowest recorded brain waves in human beings, found most often in infants and young children (they sleep a lot) but as we age, we produce less, even during deep sleep. Delta waves are associated with the deepest levels of relaxation and restorative, healing sleep. Adequate production of delta waves helps us feel completely rejuvenated after we wake up from a good night’s sleep.  ​    THE SMARTPHONE APP CONTROLS AN ELECTROMAGNETIC COIL VIA THE HEADPHONE JACKOur emotions and other external stimuli can cause our mental frequency to shift, disrupting our ability to function as we might like. ELF emmit encourages this frequency to get back in line with the task at hand.  Your moods – whether you are relaxed, focused, stressed, tired, or distracted – are directly tied to the electrical activity in your brain. Powered by your smartphone and using a free app with an easy to use interface, ELF emmit can help you train your brainwaves to sync up with the mood you want to reach.  Choose a mood in the free mobile app, and ELF emmit will start to work. With repeated use, your brain will grow accustomed to the stimuli ELF emmit produces and adapt more and more quickly. =    THE PACE OF MODERN LIFE HAS GROWN INCREASINGLY RAPID AND STRESSFULFor many, it is difficult to imagine taking the time to relax, to light a fire in your hearth and just sit and watch it, to meditate, to ride a train and fall asleep to the smooth sound of turning wheels. Playing drums or meditating in the middle of the office seem equally unimaginable. The ELF emmit offers an alternative solution.  FDA approved technology implemented in a 100% safe, non-invasive deviceThe PEMS technology used in the ELF emmit has been approved by the FDA for medical applications, and is completely safe and non-invasive. Running at 3.4 millitesla (mT), a measurement of magnetic fields, the ELF emmit is totally harmless. It is just powerful enough to be recognized and responded to by our brains.  Quality materials to last a lifetimeELF emmit uses simple construction without many moving parts and is built from resilient poly-carbonate and thermoplastic. It will stand the test of time, even with repeated daily use.   Carefully crafted with sleek, modern designExpertly designed in a slim, elegant headband, the ELF emmit is equally at home in your place of residence, the office, or anywhere else. While most devices utilizing PEMS technology are bulky, heavy, and require a power outlet to run, the ELF emmit weighs just .7 ounces and gets all its power from your headphone jack. It is light enough to be taken wherever you go and be worn all day or night.  Open source for endless possibilitiesELF emmit's software is entirely open source. Right now, students and their professors as well as expert specialists are working on new and exciting applications for the system.In addition to developing our own new programs, we’ll carefully check any that are sent to us and add them to the app if they really do work.​  In the past, people used extremely low frequencies to achieve altered states of consciousness. Meditation along with the rhythmic sound of drums, gong therapy, or steady flashing lights can all transport you into a state of thoughtfulness and transcendence. Even the sound of rolling wheels when riding a train can put us to sleep. The brain reacts to every color, voice, sound, loved one, and dissatisfaction. The ELF emmit taps into this reaction, blending the traditions of the past with the technology of the future - wearables grounded in neuroscience. It uses state-of-the-art extra-low frequency pulsed electromagnetic therapy to naturally and non-invasively optimize the performance of your mind and body.Our minds and bodies run at different speeds, depending on what we are doing. Problems arise when, because of upper impact interference, your brain frequency is not aligned with what you are trying to do or to achieve. We have all experienced how fear and stress inhibit you from thinking clearly and concentrating. Don’t forget what happens to our concentration when we are in love! We may feel great, but we’re in big trouble if we have to concentrate on something other than the object of our affections. In the same way, external electrical frequencies, not aligned with our brain frequencies, can disrupt our ability to function as we might like. These emotions and external stimuli cause our brain frequency to swing sharply, and our level of concentration moves along with it. Unfortunately, we are not all yoga gurus, able to balance ourselves through meditation, wherever we find ourselves.Imagine if you could rewire your brain to connect a situation to the mental state that best suits it, by choosing yourself. That is what the ELF emmit will help you achieve.  ​  Is your video available in other languages?Yes it is! We currently have the video localized into Arabic, Chinese, German, Hebrew, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish. What is ELF emmit made of?ELF emmit is made of non-allergenic plastic. It is smooth, flexible and completely latex-free. Designed as a headband that rests just above your ears, wrapped around the back of your head, it contains sophisticated technology. Please treat your ELF emmit with care and avoid unnecessary bending. Let it become your personal assistant for many years to come. How can I clean my ELF emmit?Clean the exterior of your ELF emmit device with Isopropyl Alcohol or alcohol-based sanitizer applied to a cloth or cotton swab. Do not submerge the device in any liquids. Where does the name come from?ELF stands for "extra-low frequency," since it uses extra-low frequency electromagnetic pulses to stimulate the brain. The "emmit" part? Well, let’s just say it’s a creative spelling of "emit" as in "emitting electromagnetic pulses." Is ELF emmit a safe device?Of course! We’ve created ELF emmit as device that relies exclusively on natural extra-low frequency electromagnetic pulses, which are complementary to the chemistry and functions of the body. It is entirely non-invasive and completely safe. Is it FDA approved?ELF emmit doesn’t require a FDA approval, as it’s not considered a medical device. But the scientific principle on which it is based, PEMT (pulsed electromagnetic therapy) is FDA approved. Why is ELF emmit a headband?Low frequency electromagnetic pulses that ELF emmit produces penetrate through the body. However, the intensity decreases as the distance grows from the target area: the brain. That's why we designed ELF emmit as a headband. Can I wear ELF emmit for a longer period?Yes. But we recommend you to follow the user guide instructions. Why? Because using a single frequency longer than necessary may lead to loss of a benefit previously experienced. It's like entering a room full of flowers. After a while you get accustomed to the scent. How can I charge my ELF emmit?ELF emmit uses your mobile phone or tablet as its energy source, plugged in via the headphone jack. As long as your phone or tablet is charged, ELF emmit is charged, too. What are the benefits of my ELF emmit being powered via the headphone jack?This system offers a safety guarantee—if you are comfortable wearing headphones, which get their power from the headphone jack, then you’ll be just as comfortable wearing the ELF emmit, as the same, entirely harmless, amount of electricity powers both. This also allowed us to make the ELF emmit as slim and lightweight as possible, since it does not need to contain a bulky battery. How does the ELF emmit smart phone application send information to the device?The ELF emmit application communicates with the ELF Emmit device via the cable, which plugs into the headphone jack of your tablet or smartphone, and which likewise powers the device. Can ELF emmit get wet?ELF emmit is water resistant, but not waterproof. It will do well through the normal day-to-day use, but please don’t go scuba diving with it. Do you protect my privacy and how?We absolutely protect your privacy, at a very high level. All your data belongs to you. We take the responsibility of protecting your data and privacy seriously. You can read more about our data privacy policy here. Can I become a domestic or international dealer of ELF emmit?Of course. We strongly support this idea of yours, and will help you as much as possible! To apply, please email us. You will receive an email confirmation and shortly thereafter our marketing team will contact you and walk you through the process. What technology does ELF emmit use?It uses PEMS (pulsed electromagnetic stimulation) technology that naturally changes the predominant brain speed pattern. Our bodies are electrical and chemical: every heartbeat generates electromagnetic pulses that chemically stimulate tissues and cells. ELF emmit encourages the brain to produce a certain rhythm that best suits the state of mind you’d like to be in, with the use of low frequency electromagnetic stimulation. Uh, what’s PEMS technology, again?Brain frequencies are produced by masses of neurons communicating with each other, changing according to what we are doing or feeling. Different brain frequencies result in different states of mind.PEMS technology uses very weak electro-magnetic impulses in extra-low frequencies, to encourage our mind to work at a speed we choose, to best perform the task at hand. In the same way that meditating along with the rhythmic sound of drums, gong therapy and steady flashing lights all transport you into a state of thoughtfulness and transcendence, PEMS can guide your mood. Is the efficacy of PEMS scientifically supported?Yes, it is! The concepts behind PEMS technology have been around for millennia. The ancient Greek physician, Galen, wrote about the healing properties of magnets back around 200 BC, and it has always been a staple of Chinese medicine. Even in the US, it was used widely until 1908, when a medical report by physician Abraham Flexner dramatically changed the way America medicated, leading to a shift towards an almost complete reliance on pharmaceuticals over other, less-invasive treatments. There are several variations on this therapy such as PEMF (pulsed electromagnetic field therapy and PEMT (pulsed electromagnetic therapy). PEMS, PEMT and PEMF have a rich history in the US, as well as FDA approval. Magnetic therapy was marginalized in the US until the early 1970s, when a Dr Friedenberg published his findings that electromagnetic field therapy helped certain types of bone fractures to heal more quickly than similar fractures in patients who were not exposed to this treatment. This was expanded by Dr Andrew Bassett of Columbia University Medical Center, who in 1974, found further success in treating non-healing bone fractures and pseudarthroses, with the use of low frequency electromagnetic signals. In 1979, the FDA approved the use of electromagnetic therapy for fractures. A decade later, the FDA approved its use for treating pain and edema. In 2011, transcranial magnetic stimulation received FDA approval for treating depression, and for treating migraines in 2013. ELF emmit draws on this long, rich history of the scientifically-proven success of electromagnetic therapy.  Do I need to be at a certain place to use ELF emmit?Not at all. You can use it anywhere. All you need is a tablet or smart phone to choose the working mode. Can the ELF emmit improve my general health?Absolutely! ELF emmit can help reduce stress, improve concentration and aid sleeping. How does ELF emmit influence my body?ELF emmit produces low frequency electromagnetic pulses that gently encourage your brain waves to join in with the chosen frequency of the pulses. With regular use, your brain will quickly synchronize with your chosen state of mind, thanks to ELF emmit acting as an intermediary. Will I feel the effects right away?You will not feel the effects the instant you turn on the device for the first time. ELF emmit trains your brain, rather than suddenly altering it the moment you first turn it on. We recommend regular use for at least a week, at which point you will certainly notice a difference. The brain takes a bit of time and practice to synchronize with the pulses produced by ELF emmit. Once your brain has been trained to sync with ELF emmit, you should feel results immediately and regularly when using it. Can I use ELF emmit too much?No. Low frequency electromagnetic stimulation has minimal-to-no effect on healthy cells. Actually it seems to be ignored by cells that are in optimal condition, balanced and in no need for extra energy. Use it as much as you like, but only when you need it.  I was told electromagnetic waves produce "electro smog," and that this is a bad thing.Electro smog comes from devices with particular field strengths and high frequencies. These frequencies can induce heat in tissue and potentially damage cells. Our technology is based on carefully-selected low frequency stimulation that is non-invasive, natural, and does not create electro smog. No worries. Does ELF emmit work with iOS and Android?Yes. ELF emmit works with both iOS and Android. Where can I download the application?The application is available both in Google Play and the Apple Store. What devices are compatible with ELF emmit?Most smart phones and tablets are compatible with Elf emmit. Is there a web application?We do not have a web application at this time. Do I have to pay for the app?The ELF emmit application is absolutely free. What is your returns policy?During the Indiegogo campaign, you can get a refund via Indiegogo anytime. But we are so confident in the quality and efficacy of our products that we are happy to offer a complete 30-day, money-back guarantee after the campaign, as well. Just visit our website, www.elfemmit.com, which will go live after the campaign, and there will be a "returns" button. We will give you a 100% refund if you are not completely satisfied within 30 days of your receipt of our product, no questions asked.  How can I tell that it’s on and working?The electromagnetic pulses produced by ELF emmit have no physical sensation on the skin, which is one of the reasons it’s so non-invasive, comfortable and easy to use regularly. Plugged in, and with the app running, the ELF emmit is working—the screen will dim, and the text will indicate that the device is working. The app is designed to tell you if there is a problem and the product is not functioning. Is ELF emmit recommended by health professionals?Yes, it is. Although ELF emmit is not a medical device, and does not substitute for medical advice or doctor’s appointments, health professionals endorse ELF emmit and believe that it contributes to better overall health, primarily through decreasing stress, increasing concentration and improving sleep. Is ELF emmit a medical device?No. ELF emmit does not diagnose or cure any health condition or problem, so it is not officially considered a medical device, though it can contribute to better overall well-being and an improved lifestyle. Do you ship internationally?Yes, we do, and all shipping charges are covered when you back our project.

story:
Our Story

In March of 2010, a group of seven medical professionals traveled to Tanzania and set up clinics that provided free health care to the people of Karance and Sanya Juu.  In May of 2011, we will be going to Kenya to do it all again!  The team is comprised of nurses, doctors, and social workers mostly from the Upstate New York area.  We will be focusing on the area of Kibera, the largest slum in Africa.  Our patients will have free access to our medical care which will include diabetic and blood pressure screenings, treatment of infections, and wound care.  We will also provide medications, walkers and canes, as well as shoes and clothing.  We leave from New York on May 14th and spend two weeks at our clinic.

 

The Impact 

We will be setting up a clinic where we will screen, diagnose, and treat anyone who comes to see us.  The clinic will be free of charge and stocked with medications, dressings, medical equipment, and caring individuals.  The group will include several nurses, a social worker, and physicians trained in different areas of expertise. 

 

The people we will see and treat rarely visit a doctor due to their lack of access to medical care.  We expect to see cases similar to those in Tanzania which ranged from wounds and parasites to severe infections, high blood pressure and diabetes.  Some of these conditions will prove fatal without our treatment.  In Kenya, we hope to continue our efforts to save and improve the lives of our patients as we did in Tanzania. 

 

What We Need

This trip will cost each person approximately $4,500.  This includes airfare, safe housing and food for fourteen days, transportation, and medications and supplies for the clinic.  Whatever money we raise will go towards offsetting these costs for the members of our group and supplying our clinic.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone can help us by sending this link to another generous person looking to donate to a great cause!  Every donation in any amount is greatly appreciated.

story:
What's this about?

Some, but not all, of you may know that I have Type 1 diabetes, like the girl in the video, and have for almost 20 years. Holy cow! Here are some facts:

  • I have to check my blood glucose at least 6-10 times a day, if not more.
  • Because my immune system waged war on my pancreas, I have to take insulin every day no matter what.
  • When I exercise, I have to be aware of what is going on with my glucose levels because I might go too low (feed me Gu!) or too high (DKA=bad news).

This fundraising campaign is important to me because if I can attend CampWILD I will learn how to be good about glucose control while doing endurance sports! By donating, you will be helping me:

  1. Live longer and be healthier.
  2. Gain knowledge and skills.
  3. Give back to the supportive community of endurance athletes with chronic medical conditions that has supported me in my efforts so far.

I think the most important thing here is that by funding this cause you will be making a significant and lasting impact that you will be able to see and experience. Last year I asked you to donate to a large organization, the ADA, for a similar reason. This year, I'm asking you to donate to help a diabetic in an immediate and very impactful way.

Where will the money go?

I'm asking for $2,200 because that is the cost of the camp, plus covering the fees from Paypal. From the CampWILD website, here is a breakdown of what is provided:

  • Professional guidance from the pros (they work with Elite athletes!).
  • Meals for the week of camp.
  • A lifetime of better health and positive impact.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Pass this along using the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Let others who might be interested in getting involved know about it
  • Throw a fundraising party!

Or you can just let me know you're supportive of this effort. It's hard for me to talk about my experiences living with diabetes, so I hope that by utilizing and expanding on this group of people it will help me be more supportive of my community in return.

 

THANKS FOR YOUR GENEROSITY!!! See the following links for more info on Type 1, Athletes competing with it, and my own favorite sports!

http://www.teamnovonordisk.com/

http://teamwildathletics.com/

http://jdrf.org/

http://tour.diabetes.org/site/PageServer?pagename=TC_homepage

http://spidermonkeycycling.com/

YAY!!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, We are Karen Quaye from Ghana and Agnes Ling from Malaysia, both medical students in the Charles university in Prague. We are driven by the urge to help the sick and less fortunate. When little Yaw's plight came to our attention we decided to help, by raising funds for  his treatment. Yaw suffers from Acute Myeloid Leukemia , a Cancer that will kill him if he doesn't get treatment soon.

What We Need & What You Get

We aim  to raise 100,000 USD for Yaw's treatment. Your contribution will be used in three main areas, 1.  cost of Chemotherapy sessions  2. Cost of a bone marrow transplant  and 3. the cost of his stay in the  hospital. Should your require accounting with regard to your contribution,receipts can be made available for your perusal .

We urge you to visit the web page  of the  Hospital's efforts against Childhood cancers.

www.facebook.com/ChildhoodAwarenessKATH

Admitted, obtaining the target amount for this effort is a long shot. But, we are driven by  hope, to see Yaw get better....hope that people still live their lives in the service of others, that our shared Humanity will spur you on to help another man...even a total stranger.


The Impact

To save a life is to preserve the World, and this fact is made relevant more so when its an innocent unfortunate life in question. Your help will go directly to salvage a helpless kid from certain demise. A family will most definitely be happier . You would have brought Joy to someone's world.
Seeing a child smile is priceless and your contribution  to this endeavor will most definitely see Yaw smile again.
A sick kid is a sore sight for the eyes, YOU can help make him better.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a monetary donation,please donate a bit of your time to spread the word about Yaw. If you are religious you can help by saying a prayer for Yaw. If you aren't  your  thoughts of goodwill towards him will be very much appreciated. Nothing you do to help is too little to make a difference.   

We welcome  any questions you may have, you can send an email to us via  kariqua88@yahoo.com.

Thank you so much!

Admitted, obtaining the target amount for this effort is a long shot. But, we are driven by  hope, to see Yaw get better....hope that people still live their lives in the service of others, that our shared Humanity will spur you on to help another man...even a total stranger.
 


    The ImpactTo save a life is to preserve the World, and this fact is made relevant more so when its an innocent unfortunate life in question. Your help will go directly to salvage a helpless kid from certain demise. A family will most definitely be happier . You would have brought Joy to someone's world. Seeing a child smile is priceless and your contribution  to this endeavor will most definitely see Yaw smile again. A sick kid is a sore sight for the eyes, YOU can help make him better.
  Other Ways You Can Help If you are unable to make a monetary donation,please donate a bit of your time to spread the word about Yaw. If you are religious you can help by saying a prayer for Yaw. If you aren't  your  thoughts of goodwill towards him will be very much appreciated. Nothing you do to help is too little to make a difference.    
We welcome  any questions you may have, you can send an email to us via  kariqua88@yahoo.com. 
Thank you so much!

story:
Please help me reach the fundraising goals to be able to work in the Philippines.

This year, I will be headed to Iloilo, Philippines with an organisation called Work the World to take part in a Dental Outreach Elective program. The opportunity allows me to work both in large government-run institutions and small communities - as I am partnered with government outreach programs.

So far, I have held a few events in Cork, Ireland to help cover the costs of the Program (including hospital fees, a donation to the ward, and costs to cover supplies).


The Department of Health (DOH) in the Philippines have announced that 87.4% of Filipinos are suffering from tooth decay and 70% of Filipinos do not visit their dentists regularly

Through this experience I hope to:

- Extend the dental hygiene message to as many children as time will allow - Providing free dental checks, advise and treatment in under serviced areas

- Reduce the discomfort in any patient seen due to their oral ailments
- The opportunity to be a part of unique cases that may not be often seen in Cork
- Further our skills to enhance my learning and technical skills in dentistry

Any donation that you are willing to provide would be greatly appreciated.

Sincerely,
Alexandra Hunter

story:
The Amazon, an inestimable heritage

The Amazon is the lung and heart of our planet, home of the world’s longest river and provider of the largest collection of life-sustaining plants and diverse animal species on earth. Amongst the 40,000 scientifically recorded plant species, over 2,000 are known to have medicinal properties, useful in treating human diseases, including cancer. Many have yet to be discovered.

The Amazon is also home to Indigenous ancestral medicinal knowledge that has played a critical role in the health of Indigenous communities. This knowledge, which includes the use of medicinal plants and related healing practices is disappearing at an alarming rate.


Can humanity risk losing this knowledge?

Indigenous concepts of health and illness is wholistic in nature, encompassing all that is experienced by a human in relation to his or her surroundings, including activities, family, community, and the natural environment. For an illness to be treated, the healer will focus essentially on reestablishing the patient’s essential balance as much within himself as with his social group and the spiritual forces. To this, sacred plants play an essential role in healing the patient. Due to myriad social, economic and political pressures, Indigenous peoples’ separation from their traditional health practices is having a devastating impact. The pressures of modern development have degraded environmental and cultural support systems. The impact of this loss is widely felt throughout Indigenous communities that are in a dire state due to widespread pollution, loss of land and resources, malnutrition, alcoholism and suicide. In sum, the paradigm shift to “modernity” has created a void that threatens the Indigenous way of life, and the riches of knowledge it holds for all of humanity. Accelerating this rapid loss is that:

- Access to Western healthcare is sporadic and poorly adapted to Indigenous culture and ways of life.

- Elders are dying without passing their knowledge onto the next generation.

- The value system that harmonized the relationships between the individual, the community and the environment is compromised.

- There is an erosion of trust among Indigenous people for the Western culture that has taken so much and given so little back, and bridges of important exchange are blocked.

To forcefully state it again, we are on the verge of losing the Indigenous culture and its wisdom that opens the doors to wholistic concepts of health and the vast, life-sustaining plants of the rainforest.


If We Act Now, A Different Story Is Possible

Sacha Warmi Center exists and serves to contribute to the preservation and renewal of Indigenous medicine, and for creating intercultural dialogue that will directly benefit Amazonian communities and Western understanding of Indigenous health systems and healing practices. These goals are furthered by:

- Reacquainting Indigenous communities with their health and medicinal traditions.

-  Creating opportunities for intercultural dialogue between Indigenous and Western medical practitioners, that sensitizes both to each other’s important technologies and healthcare practices.

- Creating socioeconomic opportunities that will foster Indigenous pride in their traditions and preserve their natural resources.


A 30 Year Journey

As founder of Sacha Warmi Center, Didier Lacaze’s vision to preserve and support the reclamation of Indigenous knowledge among its rightful peoples and advance healthcare the world over, is the culmination of a lifetime of work. For 30 years. Didier Lacaze has worked among with Peruvian and Ecuadorian Indigenous communities. He has authored scientific articles and books. He is a frequent lecturer, and consultant to governmental health agencies on matters related to Indigenous health and medicinal plants.

YOUR DONATION AT WORK!

Eighteen months ago, Sacha Warmi was a beautiful piece of land and a vision. Your carefully managed contributions have gone a long way to making Didier’s vision a living reality. Last year’s successful fundraising campaigns drew donations from passionate contributors such as yourself, raising almost $25,000! These efforts helped Sacha Warmi Center open our doors and initiate our first programs as an informational resource and educational center. The center and our programs have reached deeply and affected many. Already our programs have fostered interest not only among surrounding Indigenous communities, but also with Ecuadorian healthcare governmental agencies and foreign-based organizations that share our values and mission.

The response to the inception of Sacha Warmi Center amongst Indigenous communities has been tremendous. The most rewarding outcome has been the strong response from Indigenous communities to our Mingas (traditional communal gatherings in which people give a hand), workshops and lectures with the participation of over 150 adults and children.


2014 Construction and Maintenance Projects have included:

-  Volunteer house

-  Plant Processing

-  Maloca/Medicine House

-  Medicinal Garden

-  Pedagogical Garden

-  Main entrance and parking area for visitors

-  Water pond


All activities have targeted and benefited local Indigenous communities, children, women and men. They included:

Five  educational and training workshops on medicinal plants, Intercultural health, essential oil and floral water extraction, natural soap making.
Three pedagogical visits from secondary and elementary school children.
Health consultations: different therapies offered like massage, osteopathy, naturopathy.
Outreach: promotional visits to surrounding Kichwa, Shuar and Secoya communities and local schools.

Our plant processing facility is up and running, and training has already allowed us to loan one distillation unit to a nearby village. Plants from our gardens are allowing us to produce essential oils and floral waters, the sale of which helps us with our operational expenses, and serves as a commercial model for Indigenous people.


12 volunteers from Ecuador, USA, France, Switzerland and Italy nurtured us with their energy and expertise, adding much value to the development of our programs and projects. We want to take this opportunity to thank them and express our gratitude for their contribution

In 2014, we also hosted visiting students from Universidad de Guaranda and the University of Tennessee, Indigenous leaders, members of local government institutions, and health professionals.

Reciprocity and sustainability underscore our every endeavor. In 2014 -

We signed a covenant signed with Ecuadorian foundation –Fundaciòn Ambiente y Sociedad (FAS) allowing Sacha Warmi Center to gain non-profit institutional status.

We entered in an agreement with Runa Foundation for exchange between volunteer’s programs. Runa Foundation is the non-profit branch of Runa Clean Energy, the maker of Ecuadorian guyausa tea beverage.

We began working with a US-based herbal companies for possible joint projects to support local populations in plant cultivation and or sustainable commercial extraction.

There is a strong possibility Sacha Warmi Center will become a designated center of reference by the Ecuadorian health governmental agency.


Now Is The Time To Step Forward


Our momentum is formidable, and so is our challenge to become fully operational! Our 2015 goal is to complete construction of two main structures critical to serving our stakeholders, and substantiate the many opportunities ahead of us.

The $15,000 raised in this campaign will go towards the construction of the critically important Interpretative center. This is the place where all visitors will make their first stop, learning about SWC’s vision and mission. From here they will begin their guided visit. Features of the Interpretive center include:
•  A medicinal plant nursery (next to the center)
•  A library providing educational reading and video material
•  A gift shop
 
For the time being, the Interpretative center will also serve as our learning center, where we will conduct workshops on different subjects relating to intercultural healthcare, and how Indigenous people can grow and process plants into marketable products, leading to economic sustainability.

Your generous donation will also go to support our Training Program for Intercultural Health Leaders and to hire a full time assistant, freeing up Didier's time so he can focus on managing the center, teaching and hosting visits by Indigenous communities.

Our Gift To You

As a heartfelt thank you for your generosity, we have selected some great gifts for each level of donation. All of the items have been crafted or produced in the surrounding Indigenous communities or at the Sacha Warmi Center. Owning one of these artisan gifts will bring the spirit of the Amazon into your life, and will remind you of your contribution to preserving and revitalizing Amazonian culture, wisdom and its natural resources.


Other Ways You Can Help ... Every Little Bit Counts

If you are a student or simply do not have the means to contribute, but are inspired by our project, there are many ways you can help. Most pressing would be for you to spread this campaign as wide and as far as you can possibly send it. Share it with your friends on social media, tell your co-workers, family, friends. Make some noise about this campaign. It means so much to so many!
Click on the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of this page to get started. Share as widely and as often as you possibly can! Every click to our page is an opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others.

More About Us and Our Supporters

Board of Advisors

Miguel Alexiades
 Senior Lecturer in Ethnobotany and Conservation, School of Anthropology and Conservation, University of Kent, Canterbury, Kent, UK.
 Email: malexiades@gmail.com


The Sacha Warmi Center grows out of the unique lifetime experience and remarkable dedication of Didier Lacaze to the closely interrelated issues of Amazonian health and well-being, traditional medicine and human-environment interactions. Its strategic location, purpose and ethos all reflect a deep commitment and sophisticated understanding of the challenges and opportunities of intercultural exchange and dialogue as a process through which to generate the kinds of knowledge, skills and pedagogy that is needed to face today's acute socio-environmental crisis in today's multi-cultural, post-colonial Amazonia.

Dr. Leti Viteri Gualinga  
Director Regional Hospital Puyo (Pastaza)
 Email: witirosa@gmail.com

Sacha Warmi Center offers an opportunity to the local population, be it indigenous or non-indigenous, to access another way to approach health and healing. It is about re-creating, re-learning, remember what was always in our memory… This is the medicine of the future. The Sacha Warmi Center is a Project with a vision of humanity; a place where this vision is being created.

Soc. Kati Alvarez 
Msc. en Ciencias Sociales con mención en Antropología 
Email: kalvarez@fcds-doi.org

One of the challenges and conscious contributions of the Sacha Warmi Center is to seek the confluence between the recognition and the construction of Ecuador as a plurinational and intercultural country through its integral approach to health and healthcare. The knowledge and experience of Rosa Canelos and Didier Lacaze point to the cosmological and epistemological conceptions and health practices in the Ecuadorian Amazon as the expression of the Sumak Kawsay, “Living well”. The living testimony of the Amazonian cultures becomes the communicating strategy, for harmonious and complementary teaching and apprenticeship to build interculturality through a horizontal dialogue, where the understanding of traditional medical systems converge for the benefit of indigenous nations, peoples, and Ecuadorian society as a whole.

Robert Weisz, Ph.D. 
Clinical Psychologist and Director de la Clínica de Hipnoterapia y Brainspotting y Director del Instituto Milton Erickson de Hipnosis Clínica y Ciencias del Comportamiento de New Mexico 
Email: robert.weisz1@gmail.com

Sacha Warmi is a place, a project, and a vision of a land-based, traditional relationship between humans and plants and healing.The Indigenous tradition of deep connection with nature and a conscious, skillful relationship with medicinal plants is fast disappearing in the Amazonian rainforest. Sacha Warmi is an effort to revive and to renew the traditional model of a sustainable way of cultivating medicinal plants and the preparation and use of those plants for health and healing in indigenous communities. Sacha Warmi is a model and a resource for indigenous people, for healers, for herbalists, and for all those who would learn how to live and work with plant medicines, which are our gift and our legacy from Nature. SachaWarmi represents an organic, sustainable, and accessible model for restoring and improving the traditional approach to wellness and health care among indigenous people.

Daniela Peluso, Ph.D
Senior Lecturer, Social Anthropology. Academic Head of Social Anthropology. Deputy Director of Post Graduate Taught Programmes. School of Anthropology and Conservation, University of Kent, Canterbury, Kent CT2 7NR, United Kingdom.
Email: D.Peluso@kent.ac.uk

I am pleased to be associated with the Sacha Warmi Center, because of its sustained engagements with local communities in ways that show an understanding of the actual challenges that Amazonian local peoples face today. Its founder, Didier Lacaze, has a long and positive history of commitment to indigenous health practices and education throughout the Amazon. I am all too familiar with large scale projects that develop a bureaucracy that, in turn, needs to be sustained as its primary goal. I am strongly assured that the Sacha Warmi Center uses its knowledge and resources in impacting and sustainable ways.

Diane Haug, M.A., LPCC Psychotherapist, Teacher, and Guide 

Email:  dianeh@newmexico.com

Emphasizing the time-honored relationship between people and plants, the Sacha Warmi Center offers a comprehensive, land-based model/resource for education, health care and healing.  Having spent over three decades working with Indigenous communities in Peru and Ecuador, Didier Lacaze brings his rich life experience, dedication, and uncommon integrity to this vision.  With our life on this precious Planet Earth increasingly threatened, the preservation of traditional wisdom offers both guidance and hope for our future.

U.S.-based Indiegogo Support Team

Most of the activities supporting Sacha Warmi Center would not be possible without the time and talents generously contributed by an international group of volunteers and friends. We thank the many who have joined us over the years, and make special mention of those currently sharing their talents in supporting our current public relations and fundraising needs.

Marc Thibault
Entrepreneur and Explorer
Email: marc@green-age.org

I am grateful to have been offered the opportunity to join and assist Didier Lacaze in the realization of his vision. I am confident in the years to come, we'll look back at these endeavors and realize their contribution to preserve and enhance our collective knowledge as well as our relationships with everything there is.

Woody Winfree
Life-cycle Celebrant ®, Author and Advocate for the Future
Email: woodywinfree@gmail.com

My commitment of support for SWC came forth out of the core of my being, knowing that it will produce important outcomes for the benefit of the Amazonian people and the future of medicine. The very existence of the Sacha Warmi Center creates a healing that is beneficial for all people and the planet.

Kirsten Kairos (KK) Sound, Movement & Holotropic Breathwork™ Facilitator, Voice Over Artist, Global Volunteer, and Yin Activist
Email: kk@ZoBinaPori.com

Didier Lacaze is one among a select few I have found to walk a path of such dedication and integrity. I am so moved by his passion for the honoring and active support of indigenous cultures in Ecuadorian Amazonia. 

Sacha Warmi Ecuadorian Land-Based Team

Valeria (Kichwa/Pastaza) & Manolo Santa Maria (Kichwa/Pastaza)

Luis Fernando Canelos, Responsable Programa "Video en las Comunidades"

Institutional Partners

Fundacion Ambiente y Sociedad (Ecuador)
http://www.ambienteysociedad.org/

Runa (Ecuador)
http://runa.org/

People and Plants International (USA)
http://peopleandplants.org/

Foundation Traditional Medicinals (USA)
http://www.traditionalmedicinals.com/

AquaBella Organic Solutions (USA)
http://www.aquabellaorganics.com/

Clear Water
http://www.giveclearwater.org/

story:
Dear All,


Iniciativa Comunitaria is an organization based in Puerto Rico founded 21 years ago by Dr. Jose Vargas-Vidot to work in solidarity with the people for the development and transformation of the community. After the devastating 2010 earthquake in Haiti that took the lives of 300,000 people and left over 1.8 million displaced, they established a branch of their international sister agency Iniciativas de Paz to provide free medical relief to the people of Haiti.

 

Beginning January 14, 2010 a small brigade of medical doctors and volunteers landed in Port-au-Prince representing Iniciativas de Paz. Since then, they have been fortunate enough to have a constant influx of medical staff and volunteers and have provided medical relief to over 75,000 Haitians sometimes seeing over 800 patients a day.

 

Slowly, Iniciativas de Paz has set roots in Haiti and through generous donations has been able to buy a home and piece of land where they will build a fully equipped pediatric hospital including a neonatal and pediatric intensive care unit, emergency room and operating room. While Corazon Alegre Hospital is built, Iniciativas de Paz has established a small clinic that serves as a free medical center twice a week for the Blanchard community of 30,000 residents. For the remainder of the weekdays attention is switched to delivering ambulatory medical care to remote areas of Haiti, sometimes traveling up to three and a half hours one-way to reach the villages.   

 

As the media coverage of post-earthquake Haiti has died down, many have forgotten about the dire help the country still needs. Small organizations like Iniciativas de Paz, which is 100% volunteer run, including the medical director of the program and the operational director who have been donating their time for over a year, still need outside support. 


As a volunteer myself, I plan on going down during my Thanksgiving break from November 19th to the 27th.  Any donations will allow this trip to be possible for me as well as help pay directly for medical supplies and other expenses the medical brigades have.  Any sort of help would be much appreciated.

 

I hope you will consider supporting the compassionate and selfless work of Iniciativas de Paz. For more information please use the contact information below.

 

Sincerely,

 

Daniel Madden

Iniciativas de Paz Volunteer

860-9666-1393       

daniel.madden11@gmail.com

Iniciativacomunitaria.org

story:
My Story 

My name is Misty Easler and I am an actor! I am reaching out to ask for your support as I embark upon an amazing 100lb or more weight loss transformation. I have dealt with weight issues all of my life. I believe I have been almost 10 sizes in 10 years. This past year has been especially hard! I hit rock bottom and became severely depressed. I've had a colonoscopy twice in the past 2 years and an endoscopy. So many of my issues with my health have been related to my weight. Back pain, knee pain, lack of energy but worst of all DEPRESSION. 

This past December I realized I gained 75lbs in just over a year and a half! This was my breaking point when just walking was so very painful on my joints. I am so grateful that all of my inner healing and inner work caught up with me just in time. By January I knew I HAD to do something to save my own life. I decided to revisit a nutritional cleanse called Isagenix that I had done 7 years ago. But this time around was going to be different!  On this journey I am aligning my BODY/MIND/SOUL, day by day. 

Being overweight is sooooooo emotional for me and many people don't understand what the stresses of life can pile on our bodies as layers of emotional fat. Obesity can be attributed to many factors, not only overeating and lack of exercise!  I am a prime example of that! 

I am asking for your support on this personal journey. I actually am using the Isagenix Nutritional Cleanse system.  I'm so thankful to have family and friends who gave me the money to get started. February 25,2012 marked the completion of my first 30 day cycle. The first week of my cleanse I found out about the #IsaBodyWeightLossChallenge. Just hearing about the challenge appealed to my competitive nature. Not to mention the winner of the challenge receives a cash prize, travel, personal training services, personal coaching, Isagenix products and becomes the face of the #IsaBodyChallenge for 2012.  That has now become my goal - to become the 2012 #IsaBodyChallenge winner.

Winning the IsaBodyChallenge would be an amazing way to further support my personal journey as well as pursuing my passion of #ACTING.  I have 5 more cycles to go before my final weigh-in to qualify for the #IsaBodyChallenge. Entering the challenge gives me an even greater sense of accountability to myself by making a public declaration of my intentions. I hope to inspire others who are hiding from society, who are ashamed and are too depressed to take action in their lives. I decided to document my journey with video diaries starting from Day 1 on my Facebook Page and You Tube Channel. 

I am moved and overwhelmed by how sharing my story has already impacted and motivated other people. Working from the inside out had the most impact on my decision to change my life and my mind/body. Everyday I am committed to my journey and my health. I  meditate, visualize, exercise and follow my nutritional cleanse schedule. I'm determined to reach my #100PoundRebirth goal and WIN this #IsaBodyChallenge.  

~Misty

The Impact

Everyday someone reaches out to me in some way or another whether to show support or to inquire as to what I am "ON" or what I am doing. This campaign #100PoundRebirth and the #IsaBodyChallenge are both vehicles to reach the masses with the universal message of self-love and self-determination, through which we can make decisions to change our circumstances by taking "massive" action.   I know in my heart that by being open and sharing what I've learned,  I will inspire others to know that they can live through what I have lived through!


This Campaign is critical because at this point I do not have the financial resources to pay for products and continue with the program to qualify for the challenge. Using Isagenix products is a requirement for the #IsaBodyChallenge. This campaign will enable me to secure those products.


What We Need & What You Get

Every dime of the money raised in this campaign will go towards the purchase of Isagenix products (and shipping).  My regimen includes Shakes, IsaPro Whey Protein, Snacks, Cleanse for Life formula and Vitamins for a 30 Day period.  The campaign goal is to fund the cost of these products for the 4-months leading up to the challenge.  If I reach my entire goal, I will buy all of my products at once.  In this way I will be certain to have the products required to continue throughout the #IsaBodyChallenge. 


I have followed this program for well over 125 days and my body is transforming before my eyes... You can see my progress through my video diary on my youtube channel www.youtube.com/100PoundRebirth  I am able to keep everyone informed on my progress and provide insight into my daily process


As a show of appreciation, donations of $50 or more will receive an exclusive 100 Pound Rebirth at the end of my campaign ...


Other Ways You Can Help

There is strength in numbers!  Please help me get the word out and drum up support for my campaign.
